dosageInstruction.text: 10 mg PO daily. Take in the morning; check BP 3x/week
500 mg PO BID with meals. Stop if GI intolerance persists
20 mg PO HS. Lipid panel in 4–6 weeks
50 mg PO BID. Hold if HR < 55 bpm
10 units SC HS. Titrate per fasting glucose
5 mg PO daily before breakfast. Monitor for hypoglycemia
